Question 4.3
```{r}
Computed1 <- pnorm(1/2) - pnorm(-3/2)
```

Question 4.4
```{r}
set.seed(42)
X1 <- rnorm(n = 10000, mean = 10, sd = 2)
summary(X1)
```

Question 4.4a
```{r}
Simulated1 <- sum(7 < X1 & X1 < 11) / 10000
print(Simulated1)
```

Question 4.4b
```{r}
X2 <- rnorm(n = 10000, mean = 10, sd = 2)
Simulated2 <- sum(7 < (X1 + X2)/2 & (X1 + X2)/2 < 11) / 10000
print(Simulated2)
```

Question 4.4c
```{r}
results <- data.frame(
  Question = c("Question 1", "Question 2"),
  Computed_Answer = c(Computed1, Computed2),
  Simulated_Answer = c(Simulated1, Simulated2)
)

print(results)
```
